data.message: Another white boy trying to fit in a world he has no business in. Get real. Ur story wasn't even interesting enough for a movie. For some reason u left out the abusive father, crazy ass mom, getting ur weak ass handed to u regular at school and ur mom having to move u from one school to the other bc ur weak ass go hit so hard with a snowball that u want into a coma. Too bad ur sorry ass woke up. Poor Haile gotta deal with that sad fact the rest of her poor pathetic trashy ass life
